body.name: WWE Goldberg Elite Series #74 Deluxe Action Figure with Realistic Facial Detailing, Iconic Ring Gear & Accessories
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 mins
features: This WWE Elite Collection action figure captures the blowout action!
One of WWE's biggest personalities and champions, this approximately 6-inch figure comes ready to wreak havoc right out of the box!

Amazing detail captures the Superstar's personality with these deluxe features: articulation for pose and play action, True FX enhanced facial detailing for life-like authenticity, WWE ring gear and iconic accessories for added play value.
Perfect for the WWE Universe and collecting!
Get all the WWE Elite Collection figures and let the battles begin!
body.description: Capture the blowout action of WWE Superstars with this Elite Collection action figure! Featuring one of WWE's biggest personalities and champions, this bold and colorful figure is approximately 6-inches and comes ready to wreak havoc right out of the box! Figure has deluxe articulation for multiple ways to pose and play, True FX enhanced facial detailing for life-like authenticity, WWE ring gear and iconic accessories—all with amazing detail capturing the Superstar's unique personality. Get all the WWE Elite Collection figures and let the collecting and battles begin! Each sold separately, subject to availability. Colors and decorations may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Calling WWE Universe! The exciting over-the-top battle action of WWE is on! Relive all your favorite moments and matches and collect your favorite Superstars with this line of products featuring authentic detail, amazing design and awesome value the WWE Universe will love! Deluxe Ring Gear & Accessories Using actual WWE Superstar reference, every detail of this elite action figures' ring gear is studied for authenticity and then created to capture the Superstar's unique style. Iconic accessories capture the action in the ring and offer extended play value for big "personality" moves and action-Packed battle. Superstar Sculpting & True FX Facial Detailing Precision sculpting captures the Superstar's unique expression and True FX facial detailing—from the eyes to skin tone to facial hair and more—creates life-like authenticity! Pose & Play Action With multiple points of articulation, you can recreate big Superstar moments, pose in a signature Superstar move or display with other WWE Superstar favorites. There are so many ways to pose and play with this highly collectible WWE Elite Collection action figure.
What's in the Box Includes WWE Elite Collection action figure (approximately 6-inches) and accessory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived early. Looks lifelike.
reviews.reviewText: I have zero complaints. This product is as advertised, and it arrived a couple of days early. Excellent quality in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: (Who’s next) to get this AWESOME figure?The likeness of Bill Goldberg is SPOT ON, and the figure’s packaging was perfect.The one thing is the hands, these hands are known to chip paint, and mine has chipped.That is my only complaint, everything else is perfect, so who’s next?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ANOTHER GREAT GOLDBERG MATTEL FIGURE!
reviews.reviewText: Awesome figure by Mattel. The ring gear Goldberg comes with are nicely detailed. Especially the World Title Belt it comes with. The head scan of Goldberg is truly authentic and lifelike to the Wrestler thanks to the TrueFX technology. Proportions are great. Articulation for dynamic poses and play. Definitely recommend him to the collection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 12, 2020
reviews.reviewText: If you're a fan of screaming headscan this figure is for you. It's a plain, simple yet great looking Goldber elite.

Ho iniziato a seguire il Wrestling WWE nell'inverno 2003/04, grazie alla messa in onda di SmackDown! su italia 1, anche se oggi lo seguo in maniera minore rispetto a sedici anni fa. Sono quindi sedici anni che volevo acquistare una action figure WWE, e la prossima uscita di The Fiend mi ha fatto finalmente acquistare il primo pezzo per iniziare una piccola collezione.Dopo una iniziale indecisione tra Triple H, Daniel Bryan e Goldberg, ho scelto quest'ultimo. La prima cosa che mi ha fatto scegliere Da Man è il fatto che questa Figure riproduce l'atleta nel 2003, l'anno in cui mi avvicinai alla visione di questa disciplina. L'atleta è ritratto con la bocca aperta, e i dettagli del volto sono molto ben realizzati. Inoltre è più massiccia di quanto mi aspettassi oltre che molto stabile; mi sono divertito a modificargli la postura, cercando quella che più ritenevo ideale, e i suoi snodi gli permettono un'ottima quantità di pose diverse. Interessanti poi sono le protezioni ai gomiti e alle ginocchia, che permettono di nascondere le giunture degli arti, oltre anche a quelli che inizialmente ho scambiato per polsini, che invece sono parte dei guanti, che permettono (anche loro) di nascondere l'articolazione. Da ricordare che all'interno della confezione è incluso un secondo set di mani, che ovviamente ho già provato!La confezione include il WWE World Heavyweight Championship, vinto contro Triple H a Unforgiven 2003, e sono rimasto piacevolmente colpito dalla bellezza di questa riproduzione della big gold belt.Voto quindi più che positivo per questa Action Figure, che sicuramente non rimarrà sola nella mia collezione!
Bellissima action figure.... Ormai le serie Elite di Mattel non sbagliano più un colpo.... Molto reale anche l'espressione del volto.... Ottimo anche l'imballaggio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Great figure but was badly packaged so the box was damaged when I recieved this, very disappointed
